text: Hi there, I need to know how to add a contact to a list through HubSpot API. When new user signup we need to push that contact to HubSpot and to the List in HubSpot. Could anyone help me find the API that does it please? Really appreciate it

Hi Ashish, API keys for customer portals were deprecated (see <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/upcoming-api-key-sunset|"Upcoming: API Key Sunset">) so you'll need to use a private app token for authentication with integrations. Please see the following guide from our developer documentation site for how to migrate:

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/migrate-an-api-key-integration-to-a-private-app>
API Keys are now in Private Apps. You need to create a new private app in order to get API Token.
For content staging, can you setup a temporary domain, and when ready, change this domain to your real domain?

Hi all, is it possible to fire HubSpot form submissions into Meta as an Ad Conversion / Events? I know there is the native integration in HubSpot but it does not include form submissions. Would this be possible using Google Tag Manager?
Yes thats possible.after the form submission you need to fire the using this gtag() function. like this:-gtag("event", "signup_completed");
